Written by: Cecil B. DeMille Jeanie MacPherson  Edward W. Townsend
Article text: Chimmie Fadden Out West   is a 1915 American  comedy   Western film  directed by  Cecil B  DeMille     1    It was made as a sequel to   Chimmie Fadden    Once lost  a print is now held in the  George Eastman House Motion Picture Collection     2      1       Chimmie is sent out west as part of a scam by a railroad company  He is to pretend to find gold  then retreat as the company takes advantage  Things do not go as planned
